post.description:
Send app notifications to the Zoom "Activity Center". (Note: This API only supports OAuth 2.0.)

**Scopes:** `app:notification:read`,`app:notification:write`

**Granular Scopes:** `marketplace:write:notifications`

**[Rate Limit Label](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/rate-limits#rate-limits):** `MEDIUM`

401.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `401`
Unauthorized **Error Code:** `124`
Invalid access token.

403.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `403`
Forbidden **Error Code:** `403`
Authenticated user has not permitted access to the targeted resource.
**Error Code:** `403`
App does not support notification feature.
**Error Code:** `403`
Account does not support notification feature.

500.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `500`
Internal Server Error **Error Code:** `500`
Notification request sending failed.

get.description:
Use this API to list all active and past app requests, or list all public and private apps. 



**Scopes:** `marketplace_app:read:admin`

**[Rate Limit Label](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/rate-limits#rate-limits):** `Medium`

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The number of records returned within a single API call.

parameters.name: next_page_token
parameters.description: The next page token is used to paginate through large result sets. The API returns a next page token whenever the set of available results exceeds the current page size. The expiration period for this token is 15 minutes.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description:
Types of app requests to query: 
* `active_requests` — All active app requests. 
* `past_requests` - All past app requests. 
* `public` - All public apps. 
* `account_created` - All apps created by this account.

next_page_token.description: The next page token is used to paginate through large result sets. The API returns a next page token whenever the set of available results exceeds the current page size. The expiration period for this token is 15 minutes.

page_size.description: The number of records returned with a single API call.

apps.description: Information about the app's user requests.

app_type.description:
The type of app: 
* `ZoomApp` — A Zoom app. 
* `ChatBotApp` — A ChatBot app. 
* `OAuthApp` — A OAuth app.

app_usage.description:
The app's usage categorization: 
* `1` — The app is under admin management. 
* `2` — Users have access to the app.

app_status.description:
The app's publication status: 
* `PUBLISHED` — The app is published. 
* `UNPUBLISHED` — The app is not published.

request_total_number.description: The total number of app requests.

request_pending_number.description: The total number of pending app requests.

request_approved_number.description: The total number of approved app requests. This field only returns when the `type` value is `past`.

request_declined_number.description: The total number of declined app requests. This field only returns when the `type` value is `past`.

latest_request_date_time.description: The latest app request's creation date and time. This field only returns when the `type` value is 'active'.

reviewer_name.description: The user who reviewed the app request. This field only returns when the `type` value is `past`.

review_date_time.description: The time at which the user reviewed the app request. This field only returns when the `type` value is `past`.

get.description:
Use this API to get app information. 



**Scopes:** `marketplace_app:read`,`marketplace_app:read:admin`

**[Rate Limit Label](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/rate-limits#rate-limits):** `Medium`

parameters.name: appId
parameters.description: The app's ID.

app_type.description:
The type of app: 
* `ZoomApp` — A Zoom app. 
* `ChatBotApp` — A ChatBot app. 
* `OAuthApp` — A OAuth app.

app_usage.description:
The app's usage categorization: 
* `1` — The app is under admin management. 
* `2` — Users have access to the app.

app_status.description:
The app's publication status: 
* `PUBLISHED` — The app is published. 
* `UNPUBLISHED` — The app is not published.

terms_of_use_url.description: The app's terms of use link.

user_role.description:
The user roles required to authorize or add the app: 
* `admin` — The user needs to have the ADMIN_MANAGEMENT role. 
* `user` — Every user can add this app.

min_client_version.description: The minimum client version required for the app.

404.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `404`
Not Found **Error Code:** `1401`
APP ID does not exist: {$appId}

get.description:
Use this API to get an app's user requests and the status of their approval. 



**Scopes:** `marketplace_app:read:admin`

**[Rate Limit Label](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/rate-limits#rate-limits):** `Medium`

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The number of records returned within a single API call.

parameters.name: next_page_token
parameters.description: The next page token is used to paginate through large result sets. The API returns a next page token whenever the set of available results exceeds the current page size. The expiration period for this token is 15 minutes.

parameters.name: appId
parameters.description: The app's ID.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description:
The type of app request to query: 
* `pending` — Only pending app requests. 
* `approved` — Only approved app requests. 
* `rejected` — Only rejected app requests.

200.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `200`   
 
App user requests returned.

next_page_token.description: The next page token is used to paginate through large result sets. The API returns a next page token whenever the set of available results exceeds the current page size. The expiration period for this token is 15 minutes.

page_size.description: The number of records returned with a single API call.

requests.description: Information about the users who have applied for app approval.

request_date_time.description: The app request's creation date and time.

reason.description: The reason for the app request.
reason.example: I want to use this app.

status.description:
The status of the user's app request: 
* `pending` — The request is pending approval. 
* `approved` - The request is approved. 
* `rejected` - The request is rejected.

404.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `404`
Not Found **Error Code:** `1401`
App ID does not exist: {$appId}

post.summary: Add app allow requests for users
post.description:
Use this API to add app allow requests for all users, groups of users, or specific users. 

 

**Scopes:** `marketplace_app:write:admin`

**[Rate Limit Label](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/rate-limits#rate-limits):** `Light`

parameters.name: appId
parameters.description: The app's ID.

action.description:
The action with which to take with the app: 
* `add_all` — Add all user for the app. 
* `add_user` — Add specified user for the app. 
* `add_group` — Add specified group of user for the app.

user_ids.description: If the `action` value is `add_user`, the user IDs to add

group_ids.description: If the `action` value is `add_group`, the group IDs to add

added_at.description: Date and time this app was added.

user_ids.description: If the `action` value is `add_user`, the user IDs to add.

group_ids.description: If the `action` value is `add_group`, the group IDs to add.

404.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `404`
Not Found **Error Code:** `1401`
App ID does not exist: {$appId}

patch.description:
Use this API to update an app's request status or update app status. Administrators can only agree to user-level apps.

 

**Scopes:** `marketplace_app:write:admin`

**Granular Scopes:** `marketplace:update:app_request:admin`

**[Rate Limit Label](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/rate-limits#rate-limits):** `LIGHT`

parameters.name: appId
parameters.description: The app's ID.

action.description:
The app's action: 
* `approve_all` — Approve all user requests for the app. 
* `approve` — Partially approve user requests the app. 
* `decline_all` — Reject all user requests for the app, users who have been approved will also be declined and the installed apps will be disabled. 
* `decline` — Partially reject user requests for app.
* `cancel` — Cancel partially user requests for app.

request_user_ids.description:
If the `action` value is `approve`, the user's request will be approved.
If the `action` value is `decline`, the user's request will be rejected.
If the `action` value is `cancel`, the user's request will be canceled.

204.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `204`   
 
App request status updated.

404.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `404`
Not Found **Error Code:** `1401`
App ID does not exist: {$appId}

get.description:
Get users' webhook call logs and query records from the past 7 days. 



**Scopes:** `marketplace_app:read:admin`,`marketplace_app:read`

**[Rate Limit Label](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/rate-limits#rate-limits):** `MEDIUM`

parameters.name: appId
parameters.description: The app's ID.

parameters.name: next_page_token
parameters.description: The next page token is used to paginate through large result sets. The API returns a next page token whenever the set of available results exceeds the current page size. The expiration period for this token is 15 minutes.

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The number of records returned within a single API call.

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: Start date in format: `yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss'Z'`. The "from" and "to" date range must be within 7 days.

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: End date.

parameters.name: event
parameters.description: The event name. All types of events are queried if the parameter is not passed.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description:
The query type: 
* `1` — Query all webhook logs. 
* `2` — Only query failed webhook logs. 
* `3` — Only query successful webhook logs.

200.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `200`   
 
Webhook logs info returned.

next_page_token.description: The API uses the next page token to paginate through large result sets. It returns a next page token whenever the set of available results exceeds the current page size. The expiration period for this token is 15 minutes.

page_size.description: The page size of the result

status.description: The http code returned from the endpoint. If the webhook is not sent to the endpoint due to an internal error, the status is `-1`

failed_reason_type.description:
The reason type for connection error messages: 
* `1` — read time out. 
* `2` — connection refused. 
* `3` — hystrix fallback. 
* `4` — hystrix timeout. 
* `5` — async error. 
* `6` — DNS forbidden. 
* `7` — remote error. 
* `8` — in delegate white list. 
* `9` — cert error. 
* `10` — need instant retry. 
* `11` — host name verify failed. 
* `12` — TLS verify failed. 
* `13` — DNS resolve time out. 
* `14` — no client. 
* `15` — resource not found. 
* `16` — too many requests.

date_time.description: The recorded time of the log.

trace_id.description: The unique identifier for a request.

401.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `401`
Unauthorized **Error Code:** `201`
You do not have permission to access the targeted resource.

404.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `404`
Not Found **Error Code:** `1401`
APP ID does not exist: {$appId}.
**Error Code:** `1501`
The 'to' date must be after the 'from' date.
**Error Code:** `1502`
The date range must be within the last seven days.
**Error Code:** `1503`
The dates must follow the format: `yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss'Z'`.
**Error Code:** `1504`
The 'from' date must be before the current date(UTC).

get.description:
Get the app user's entitlements information.

**Scopes:** `marketplace_entitlement:read:admin`,`marketplace_entitlement:read`

**Granular Scopes:** `marketplace:read:list_user_entitlements`,`marketplace:read:list_user_entitlements:admin`

**[Rate Limit Label](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/rate-limits#rate-limits):** `HEAVY`

parameters.name: user_id
parameters.description: The user ID of the user who's requesting entitlement information.

plan_name.description: The name of the plan of the user with entitlements.

plan_id.description: The UUID of the plan name.

403.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `403`
Forbidden **Error Code:** `1505`
Missing app permissions. Make sure marketplace_entitlement:read:admin scope is assigned.

404.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `404`
Not Found **Error Code:** `1002`
No entitlements assigned to the user for the app.
**Error Code:** `1402`
app is not monetized

get.description:
Use this API to get all of a user's app requests. 



**Scopes:** `marketplace_app:read`,`marketplace_app:read:admin`

**[Rate Limit Label](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/rate-limits#rate-limits):** `Medium`

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The number of records returned within a single API call.

parameters.name: next_page_token
parameters.description: The next page token is used to paginate through large result sets. The API returns a next page token whenever the set of available results exceeds the current page size. The expiration period for this token is 15 minutes.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: The user's ID.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description:
The type of app request to query: 
* `active_requests` — All active app requests. 
* `past_requests` - All past app requests.

200.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `200`   
 
User app requests returned.

next_page_token.description: The next page token is used to paginate through large result sets. The API returns a next page token whenever the set of available results exceeds the current page size. The expiration period for this token is 15 minutes.

page_size.description: The number of records returned with a single API call.

app_type.description:
The type of app: 
* `ZoomApp` — A Zoom app. 
* `ChatBotApp` — A ChatBot app. 
* `OAuthApp` — A OAuth app.

app_usage.description:
The app's usage categorization: 
* `1` — The app is under admin management. 
* `2` — Users have access to the app.

app_status.description:
The app's publication status: 
* `PUBLISHED` — The app is published. 
* `UNPUBLISHED` — The app is not published.

request_date_time.description: The app request's creation date and time. This field only returns when the `type` value is 'active'.

request_status.description:
The status of the user's app request: 
* `pending` — The request is pending approval. 
* `approved` - The request is approved. 
* `rejected` - The request is rejected.

allOf.description: Information about the user's app request status.

404.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `404`
Not Found **Error Code:** `1001`
User does not exist or does not belong to this account.

get.description:
Get a user's entitlements. 



**Scopes:** `marketplace_entitlement:read`,`marketplace_entitlement:read:admin`

**Granular Scopes:** `marketplace:read:list_user_entitlements`,`marketplace:read:list_user_entitlements:admin`

**[Rate Limit Label](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/rate-limits#rate-limits):** `MEDIUM`

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: The user's user ID or email address. For user-level apps, pass the `me` value.

401.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `401`
Unauthorized **Error Code:** `201`
This API only supports OAuth2 for authorization.
Unauthenticated users are not permitted access to the targeted resource.

404.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `404`
Not Found **Error Code:** `1002`
No entitlements assigned to the user for the app

409.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `409`
Conflict **Error Code:** `1402`
App is not monetized

type.description:
The type of deeplink. 
* `1` — Generate a deeplink that opens Zoom App in-meeting if the meeting is in progress, if not opens Zoom App in Apps Tab. \n* `2` —  Generate a deeplink that refreshes Chat App Webview. 

 This value defaults to `1`.

user_id.description: The 'userId' property of the app deeplink. This field only applies to account level OAuth token.

action.description: The action of the deeplink, it's a user-defined string.

400.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `400`
Bad Request **Error Code:** `124`
Invalid access token. **Error Code:** `300`
Invalid action. The maximum length of the value is 256.

404.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `404`
Not Found **Error Code:** `1001`
User does not exist: $userId.
